workflow.name: üõçÔ∏è Google Shopping feed optimization with Channable, Relevance AI & Merchant API
workflow.description:
# üõçÔ∏è Google Shopping Feed Optimization with Channable + Relevance AI + Google Merchant API ### üöÄ Automate, Optimize & Sync Your Product Feeds at Scale --- ## üß© Overview This workflow automates **Google Shopping Feed Optimization** using **Channable**, **Relevance AI**, and the **Google Merchant API**. It runs daily, enhancing product titles and descriptions, validating feed quality, assigning custom campaign labels, and syncing the optimized feed with Google Merchant Center. The system ensures every product listing meets Google‚Äôs content standards, is SEO-friendly, and ready for high-performance Shopping campaigns. --- ## üß† Key Benefits ‚úÖ Automated daily product feed optimization ‚úÖ AI-enhanced titles and descriptions (via Relevance AI) ‚úÖ Google Merchant API integration (latest version) ‚úÖ Quality scoring and error detection before sync ‚úÖ Custom campaign labels for segmented bidding ‚úÖ Slack alerts for issues and daily summaries ‚úÖ 100% no-code deployment with scalable batch processing --- ## ‚öôÔ∏è System Architecture | Component | Purpose | | ----------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | | **n8n** | Workflow automation and orchestration | | **Channable** | Product feed source (can replace with any eCommerce API) | | **Relevance AI** | AI title and description optimization | | **Google Merchant API (NEW)** | Product publishing and validation | | **Slack** | Alerts and reporting | | **Cron Trigger** | Daily schedule (6 AM sync) | --- ## üß≠ Workflow Logic (Visual Summary) **Daily Trigger (06:00 AM)** ‚¨áÔ∏è **1Ô∏è‚É£ Get Product Feed (Channable)** Fetches product data for optimization. ‚¨áÔ∏è **2Ô∏è‚É£ Data Quality Checks** Validates titles, GTINs, pricing, categories, and descriptions. Assigns quality scores. ‚¨áÔ∏è **3Ô∏è‚É£ Split Products** Breaks the `all_products` array into single items for AI processing. ‚¨áÔ∏è **4Ô∏è‚É£ Optimize Title (Relevance AI Tool)** Enhances product titles for SEO, clarity, and Google compliance. ‚¨áÔ∏è **5Ô∏è‚É£ Generate Description (Relevance AI Tool)** Creates 300‚Äì400 character, benefit-focused product descriptions. ‚¨áÔ∏è **6Ô∏è‚É£ Assign Custom Labels** Adds five segmentation labels: margin, performance, seasonality, stock level, and category. ‚¨áÔ∏è **7Ô∏è‚É£ Aggregate Products** Combines optimized items into one unified dataset. ‚¨áÔ∏è **8Ô∏è‚É£ Upload to Merchant Center (NEW Merchant API)** Publishes products via Google‚Äôs latest `/products` endpoint. ‚¨áÔ∏è **9Ô∏è‚É£ Check Product Status** Verifies successful uploads and identifies disapprovals. ‚¨áÔ∏è **üîç Analyze Product Issues** Summarizes errors and warnings from Merchant API results. ‚¨áÔ∏è **‚öñÔ∏è IF Disapprovals Found** ‚Üí üö® Send Slack alert for issues ‚Üí ‚úÖ Otherwise, post success summary --- ## üß© Environment Variables Set these under **n8n ‚Üí Settings ‚Üí Variables ‚Üí Add Variable** | Variable | Example | Purpose | | ----------------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------- | -------------------------------- | | `CHANNABLE_API_URL` | `https://api.channable.com/v1` | Channable API base | | `CHANNABLE_COMPANY_ID` | `12345` | Company ID in Channable | | `CHANNABLE_PROJECT_ID` | `abcd` | Project ID | | `FEED_ID` | `shopping-feed` | Feed endpoint | | `RELEVANCE_AI_API_URL` | `https://api-f1db6c.stack.tryrelevance.com/latest` | Relevance AI API base | | `RELEVANCE_TOOL_TITLE_OPTIMIZER_ID` | `tQy48Ld8n0zp` | Relevance AI Title Tool ID | | `RELEVANCE_TOOL_DESCRIPTION_ID` | `hJ9bT01r8Lqf` | Relevance AI Description Tool ID | | `MERCHANT_API_URL` | `https://merchantapi.googleapis.com/content/v2.1` | Google Merchant API base | | `MERCHANT_ACCOUNT_ID` | `123456789` | Merchant Center account ID | | `SLACK_CHANNEL` | `#shopping-feed-automation` | Slack channel for reports | --- ## üîë Credential Setup | Service | Type | Setup | | ------------------- | ---------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------- | | **Relevance AI** | HTTP Header Auth | Header ‚Üí `Authorization: Bearer {{$env.RELEVANCE_AI_API_KEY}}` | | **Channable** | HTTP Header Auth | Header ‚Üí `Authorization: Bearer {{$env.CHANNABLE_API_TOKEN}}` | | **Google Merchant** | Google OAuth2 | Scopes:
‚Ä¢ `https://www.googleapis.com/auth/content` | | **Slack** | Slack API | Add `chat:write` Bot Token Scope | --- ## üß± Node-by-Node Breakdown | Node | Description | Key Action | | ----------------------------- | ---------------------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------- | | **Daily Trigger (6 AM)** | Starts workflow every morning | `cron: 0 6 * * *` | | **Get Product Feed** | Fetches products from Channable | `GET {{$env.CHANNABLE_API_URL}}/.../feeds/{{$env.FEED_ID}}` | | **Data Quality Checks** | Validates GTINs, titles, pricing, images | Returns `quality_score` + `all_products` | | **Split Products** | Splits array into individual products | Operation: `splitOut`, Field: `all_products` | | **Optimize Title** | Calls Relevance AI title tool | `/tools/{{$env.RELEVANCE_TOOL_TITLE_OPTIMIZER_ID}}/trigger` | | **Generate Description** | Calls Relevance AI description tool | `/tools/{{$env.RELEVANCE_TOOL_DESCRIPTION_ID}}/trigger` | | **Assign Custom Labels** | Adds 5 Smart Bidding Labels | Margin, performance, seasonality, stock, category | | **Aggregate Products** | Combines optimized product data | For batch upload | | **Upload to Merchant Center** | Posts via NEW Merchant API | `/accounts/{id}/products` | | **Check Product Status** | Retrieves upload results | Lists disapproved or pending items | | **Analyze Product Issues** | Summarizes product disapprovals | Returns `disapproval_count` and `warnings` | | **IF Disapprovals Found** | Conditional routing | Sends alert or success message | | **Slack - Alert** | Sends error summary to Slack | Includes product name and issue detail | | **Slack - Success Summary** | Posts daily completion message | Includes counts and optimizations applied | --- ## üß∞ Testing Procedure 1Ô∏è‚É£ Temporarily disable the cron schedule 2Ô∏è‚É£ Run manually using **‚ÄúExecute Workflow‚Äù** 3Ô∏è‚É£ Start with 3‚Äì5 products 4Ô∏è‚É£ Check: * Slack ‚Üí Success message * Google Merchant ‚Üí Updated products * n8n Execution logs ‚Üí No failed nodes Once validated ‚Üí **Re-enable the 6 AM trigger** --- ## üßæ Example Output **Slack Success Message** ``` ‚úÖ Shopping Feed Optimization Complete üìä Summary: ‚Ä¢ Total Products Processed: 135 ‚Ä¢ Products with Quality Issues: 12 ‚Ä¢ Disapprovals: 0 ‚Ä¢ Warnings: 3 üéØ Optimizations Applied: ‚Ä¢ Titles optimized for SEO ‚Ä¢ Descriptions enhanced ‚Ä¢ Custom labels added API: NEW Merchant API (merchantapi.googleapis.com) Next Run: Tomorrow 6 AM Timestamp: 2025-10-22T06:00:00Z ``` **Slack Alert Message** ``` üö® Merchant Center Disapprovals Alert Total Disapprovals: 5 Total Warnings: 2 Critical Issues: ‚Ä¢ Product: Wireless Headphones (ID: 4829) Issue: Missing GTIN ‚Ä¢ Product: Yoga Mat Eco (ID: 7350) Issue: Invalid price Action Required: Review disapproved products in Merchant Center. Timestamp: 2025-10-22T06:00:00Z ``` --- ## üìä Success Metrics | Metric | Goal | | ---------------------------- | ------------------- | | Feed approval rate | ‚â• 90% | | AI optimization success rate | ‚â• 95% | | Manual review reduction | 80% | | Daily automation uptime | 99.9% | | Scalable throughput | 5,000+ products/day | --- ## üß© Maintenance Schedule | Frequency | Task | | ------------- | ------------------------------ | | **Daily** | Monitor Slack alerts | | **Weekly** | Check disapproval logs | | **Monthly** | Refresh API tokens | | **Quarterly** | Tune AI prompts and thresholds | --- ## ü™ú Next Steps ‚úÖ Deploy workflow in production üìà Connect to your performance dashboard üåç Extend to multi-language feeds (Relevance AI translations) üí° Add conversion optimization loop in Google Ads --- ## üîó References * [n8n Documentation](https://docs.n8n.io) * [Relevance AI Documentation](https://relevanceai.com/docs) * [Google Merchant API Docs](https://developers.google.com/merchant/api) * [Channable Help Center](https://help.channable.com) --- ### üéâ Conclusion You now have a **production-grade, AI-driven Shopping Feed Optimization workflow** built on: * **Channable** for structured data ingestion * **Relevance AI** for content intelligence * **Google Merchant API** for publishing * **n8n** as the automation engine üí° **Result:** A fully autonomous product feed system that self-improves daily, keeping your listings compliant, optimized, and performing at scale.

nodes.name: Daily Trigger - 6 AM
nodes.notes: Triggers daily at 6 AM for feed optimization before Merchant Center sync

nodes.name: Get Product Feed
nodes.notes: Retrieves product feed. Can replace with your e-commerce platform API endpoint.

nodes.name: Data Quality Checks
nodes.notes: Validates: GTINs, images, categories, pricing, title/description length. Assigns quality score.

nodes.name: Optimize Title
nodes.notes: CORRECTED: Uses /trigger with tool ID. Optimizes title: Brand + Type + Features + Attributes. Max 150 chars.

nodes.name: Generate Description
nodes.notes: CORRECTED: Uses /trigger with tool ID. Generates 300-400 char benefit-focused description.

nodes.name: Assign Custom Labels
nodes.notes: Assigns 5 custom labels for segmented bidding: margin, performance, seasonality, stock, category

nodes.name: Check Product Status (NEW API)
nodes.notes: CORRECTED: Uses NEW Merchant API to list products and check for issues. PageSize now supports up to 1000.

nodes.name: Analyze Product Issues
nodes.notes: CORRECTED: Parses NEW Merchant API response format for issues

nodes.name: IF Disapprovals Found
nodes.notes: Check if any critical disapprovals exist

nodes.name: Success Summary
nodes.notes: Sends daily summary of feed optimization

nodes.name: Upload to Merchant Center (Content API v2.1)
nodes.notes: CRITICAL CORRECTION: Uses NEW Merchant API (merchantapi.googleapis.com) instead of deprecated Content API. Endpoint: /products:insert. Max 1000 products per batch.

nodes.name: Split Products1
nodes.notes: Splits the 'all_products' array from Data Quality Checks into individual product items for further processing (Relevance AI optimization, labeling, etc).

parameters.content:
# üõçÔ∏è Google Shopping Feed Optimization with Relevance AI + Google Merchant API

Automates your Google Shopping product feed optimization.
Uses Relevance AI to enhance titles/descriptions, adds custom labels, and syncs optimized products daily to Merchant Center.

## üü® Stage 1 ‚Äî Workflow Start | üïì Daily Trigger ‚Äì 6 AM | üì¶ Get Product Feed | üîç Data Quality Checks | ‚úÇÔ∏è Split Products | |--------------------------|--------------------|------------------------|------------------| | Runs automatically every morning.
Starts 6 AM daily to refresh and optimize the feed before Merchant Center sync. | Fetches product data from Channable (or your e-commerce API). | Checks for missing GTINs, titles, prices, and descriptions.Calculates a quality score for each item. | Prepares each product for AI optimization by splitting the feed into individual items. |

## üü® Stage 2 ‚Äî AI Optimization Stage

| üß† Optimize Title | üìù Generate Description | üè∑Ô∏è Assign Custom Labels | üìä Aggregate Products |
|------------------|-------------------------|-------------------------|----------------------|
| AI-powered title optimizer using Relevance AI.Improves clarity and SEO.e.g., ‚ÄúRunning Shoes‚Äù ‚Üí ‚ÄúNike Air Zoom Men‚Äôs Running Shoes ‚Äì Size 42‚Äù. | AI-generated 300‚Äì400 char benefit-focused descriptions via Relevance AI. | Adds five campaign segmentation labels (margin, performance, seasonality, stock, category). | Combines all optimized products back into a single feed ready for upload. |

## üü® Stage 3 ‚Äî Merchant Center Sync

| üöÄ Upload to Merchant Center (API v2.1) |  üîÅ Check Product Status (NEW API) | ‚ö†Ô∏è Analyze Product Issues | üö¶ IF Disapprovals Found |
|-----------------------------------------|----------------------------------|---------------------------|--------------------------|
| Publishes optimized feed in batches (max 1000) using the new Merchant API (`merchantapi.googleapis.com`). | Verifies upload results by listing live products and checking for warnings or errors. | Detects disapprovals and warnings from Merchant API responses and groups them by severity. | Routes workflow based on disapprovals ‚Äì alerts team if issues exist or sends success summary otherwise. |

## üü® Stage 4 ‚Äî Notifications

| üö® Alert ‚Äì Disapprovals | ‚úÖ Success Summary |
|--------------------------|--------------------|
| Immediate Slack alert listing disapproved products and issues requiring review. | Posts daily Slack summary with total products, issues, and confirmation of successful optimization. |

main.node: Upload to Merchant Center (Content API v2.1)

user.name: Nikan Noorafkan
user.bio: Hey, I‚Äôm Nikan Noorafkan ‚Äî a creator passionate about building smart, automated workflows that drive business outcomes. With a background in performance marketing, user acquisition, and retention strategies, I use n8n to connect data, automate repetitive tasks, and scale growth across the funnel.

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
